name: Fortune
effect:
:instant: Reroll one [Treasure](../dice.md#treasure-die), [Resource](../dice.md#resource-die), or [Attack die](../dice.md#attack-die) \*. Resolve the result of your choice

:empower: 0 ➣ \*once
:empower: 1 ➣ \*twice
:empower: 2 ➣ \*3 times

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
notes: This card has to be played *before* rolling the die. It cannot be played after the die was rolled and the result of that roll is already known.
